title: Task 8: Create /map-org slash command
description:
Create /map-org slash command for organizational mapping.

This command enables users to create company.orgmap.yaml files by:
1. Getting a structured prompt for researching VP orgs (peaks) and Director teams (rope teams)
2. Validating extracted org structure with Pydantic models
3. Saving to company.orgmap.yaml in the correct data directory

Files to create:
- .claude/commands/map-org.md

Requirements:
- Use existing orgmap operations (save_orgmap, get_orgmap)
- Provide structured research prompt for LLM-driven org discovery
- Handle YAML validation and error reporting
- Work at any stage (stage-agnostic)
- Follow existing slash command patterns in .claude/commands/

Acceptance Criteria:
- Can run /map-org {company} to get research prompt
- Can save orgmap results with validation
- Provides clear error messages for invalid data
- Integrates with existing SDK operations

title: Task 9: Create /search-roles slash command
description:
Create /search-roles slash command for role search and mapping.

This command enables users to create company.roles.yaml files by:
1. Getting a structured prompt for searching open roles
2. Mapping roles to existing orgmap structure (peaks/rope_teams)
3. Validating role data with Pydantic models
4. Saving to company.roles.yaml in the correct data directory

Files to create:
- .claude/commands/search-roles.md

Requirements:
- Use existing roles operations (save_roles, get_roles)
- Provide structured search prompt for LLM-driven role discovery
- Auto-link roles to orgmap peaks/rope_teams when possible
- Handle unmapped roles with suggestions for orgmap updates
- Work at any stage (stage-agnostic)
- Follow existing slash command patterns in .claude/commands/

Acceptance Criteria:
- Can run /search-roles {company} to get search prompt
- Can save role results with validation
- Automatically maps roles to existing orgmap structure
- Identifies unmapped roles and suggests orgmap updates
- Provides clear error messages for invalid data
- Integrates with existing SDK operations

title: Layer 1.5: Organizational Cartography - Org Mapping & Role Search
description: Add "Organizational Cartography" layer to WCTF framework, enabling discovery of VP orgs (peaks) and Director teams (rope teams), plus role search that maps to org structure. Roles and org mapping inform each other iteratively.
design:
## Architecture

### New Files
- `wctf_core/operations/orgmap.py` - Org mapping operations
- `wctf_core/operations/roles.py` - Role search with orgmap integration
- `.claude/commands/map-org.md` - /map-org slash command
- `.claude/commands/search-roles.md` - /search-roles slash command

### New Data Files
- `company.orgmap.yaml` - VP orgs (peaks) and Director teams (rope teams)
- `company.roles.yaml` - Open roles mapped to org structure

### Extended Files
- `wctf_core/models.py` - Add Pydantic models for Peak, RopeTeam, Role, etc.
- `wctf_core/client.py` - Add save_orgmap, get_orgmap, save_roles, get_roles methods

## Key Design Decisions

1. **Stage-agnostic**: Commands work at any stage, typical usage: orgmap at stage-2, roles at stage-3
2. **Separate files**: orgmap.yaml (slow-changing) vs roles.yaml (fast-changing)
3. **Iterative discovery**: Roles inform orgmap, orgmap enriches role understanding
4. **LLM-driven search**: Use WebSearch/WebFetch, SDK enforces structure/dedup
5. **Rich Pydantic models**: Validators + helpers + computed properties
6. **WCTF terminology**: "Peaks" (VP orgs), "Rope Teams" (Director teams)
acceptance_criteria:
- Can run /map-org {company} to create company.orgmap.yaml
- Can run /search-roles {company} to create company.roles.yaml
- Roles automatically link to orgmap peaks/rope_teams
- Unmapped roles trigger orgmap update suggestions
- All data validated by Pydantic models
- SDK prevents duplicate roles
- Commands work at any stage (not limited to stage-2 or stage-3)
